product-info.opis: Kožo vlaži, neguje, obnavlja in jo naredi mehko. Primerno tudi za občutljivo kožo. Dermatološko preizkušeno.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, sodium laureth sulfate, sodium chloride, cocamidopropyl betaine, cocamide dea, coco-glucoside, parfum, glycerin, citric acid, styrene\acrylates copolymer, propylene glycol, triethylene, glycol, magnesium nitrate, magnesium chloride, geraniol, butyphenyl methylpropional, citronellol, dmdm hydantoin, benzyl alcohol, methylchloroisothiazolinone, methylisothiazolinone, ci 45100, ci 61585.
